AnimeArsenal.BreathingTechniqueGeneDef.label: Serpent Breath
AnimeArsenal.BreathingTechniqueGeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene embody the elegance and fluidity of blooming flowers, unleashing techniques that blend agility and vision with deadly precision. Their attacks are a mesmerizing dance of petals and blossoms, with enhanced perception at the cost of potential strain on their eyesight.
AnimeArsenal.BreathingTechniqueGeneDef.resourceDescription: Current stored Breath, charged with the essence of serpents. This energy powers devastating snake-like abilities, ensnaring and striking enemies with lethal precision.
